name: Nightmare Town
description:
🧟 An infested Town 🧟 Another day passes without signs of other human life. I think I'm alone in this town with all of those creatures. If only could I contact with someone to come find me... I'll be trying to fix my radio and fighting those monsters again... Someone has to answer my messages soon.

Happy Halloween! 🎃

Game made for an asignment at university.
